column4: hi! my prism 2.5 card doesn't work any more after I installed the newer kernel from the repos (2.6.17-11-generic)
does anybody know why? and how can i solve my problem?
oh i don't know... one moment please...
you have your old kernel around? boot off of the old and look in /lib/firmware/`uname -r`/  see if there are differences?
